summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EUFSI LCA Tool. Backend APIs 83% functional, Frontend UI 95%+ functional. Main issue: LCA calculation fails due to Brightway2 activity name mapping errors. All core features work except final calculation and results generation.

critical_bugs.issue: LCA calculation fails with Brightway2 activity mapping error: 'ring_spinning_for_weaving,_carded_yarn' activity not found
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks entire calculation workflow and results generation

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown selection timeout when selecting 'ReCiPe' - likely due to exact text matching vs 'ReCiPe 2016 Midpoint (H)'

passed_tests: Homepage loads with EU branding and all 4 industry cards
New Assessment multi-step wizard loads correctly
Configuration form accepts all inputs (name, weight, scope, database)
History page displays saved projects with proper status
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Brightway2 activity name mapping in backend calculation engine. The error shows 'ring_spinning_for_weaving,_carded_yarn' activity is not found in USLCI database. Need to update TEXTILE_ACTIVITY_MAPPING in server.py to match actual Brightway2 database activity names.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major features working, minor dropdown issue)
success_percentage.integration: 90% (data flows correctly, calculation blocked by backend)
